positive_examples: This is an example of radiological weapon production facility.
The radiological weapon production facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed radiological weapon production facility in this context.
A typical case of radiological weapon production facility would involve these features.
The concept of radiological weapon production facility applies here.
A facility focused on the production of radiological dispersal devices and dirty bombs.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon production facility, not radiological weapon production facility.
This represents w m d weapons production facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponProductionFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsProductionFacility

definition: A facility producing weapons that disperse radioactive material.
